Reviews.Title: I love this cellphone
Reviews.Author: caveman
Reviews.Content: I simply love this cellphone. As a person who just dislike smart phone, I still like a cellphone that is sleek and stylish. And, after a year of search, I finally found exactly what I was looking for. I used this phone for several months, it worked just great. It worked perfectly fine with AT&T; service, and the cellphone surely made AT&T;'s flip cell phone selection look really dull, not-stylish, and plain-ugly. Also, one thing that I found funny is that, I can record anything with the phone and use it as ring tone or notice. I recorded my wife's voice for text message notice. So, whenever I receive text, I laughed out loud. I highly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Basic Flip Phone With Some Issues
Reviews.Author: to0pink
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a great flip phone. It is sleek and gets the job done for making phone calls.PROS:-Sleek-Very customizable interface-good quality for phone calls-strong battery life (not sure what the other reviewer had wrong with his phone)CONS:-It does NOT have a outside display for caller ID. You must open the phone to look at who is calling-The dialpad sometimes will not pick up a button press. Minor issue, but still a sloppy issue that should have been fixed-As always with samsung phones, I do not enjoy their use of the calendar system. it is not easy to set a quick reminder as you have to input lots of information just to set a reminder for yourselfOverall good flip phone if you're looking for the basic phone. It has some nit picky issues that might not annoy others

Reviews.Title: travel phone thats simple
Reviews.Author: jopa
Reviews.Content: This is a nice decent phone that you can use to make calls while traveling to europe or asia.  The GSM technology works well with my ATT sim card.  Sleek design and the camera is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Norman Gabourel
Reviews.Content: Phone works well.  Took it to Central America and I had no problems with it. The only draw back is the back cover.  It is very delicate, be careful when removing and replacing it back on.  Otherwise, it's worth the money.  Strongly suggest a case for the phone.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS THE ONE TO BUY !!!
Reviews.Author: Scott W. Curtis
Reviews.Content: IT HAS IT ALL, sleek, functional but above all, A GREAT  SIGNAL !!! look no further, I did the work bought it , tested it, AWESOME PHONE !!!  this is the new standard in COOL , if you don't want a play phone then get this one, SUPER CLEAR , strong signal for a change, they needed to make a phone like this one, by the way, I"M NOT THE ONLY ONE WHO JUST WANTS A "DAM GOOD" NORMAL PHONE !!!they SHOULD HAVE MADE THIS ALONG TIME AGO !!!!  smart phone, this phone, that phone, B.S.  DON"T LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE AT THE CELL PHONE STORE it's their job to sell you on what "they" have...BUT.... REALITY SAYS "buy one that works for a change"  THIS WORKS !!! worldwide too...  pulls in a way better signal too...  BUY IT... YOU"LL BE GLAD YOU GOT THIS ONE !!!  and this is coming from one "picky dude", trust me...  C.E.O.  Scott Curtis  "It's a winner"

Reviews.Title: Great unlocked easy to use quad band phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: DonnaW "DonnaW"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little cell phone.  Good sound, loud rings.  Good reception. Easy to use. Large buttons.It is just right!Samsung S3600i Unlocked Quad-Band Phone with 1.3 MP Camera, Bluetooth, FM Radio and microSD card slot--International Version with Warranty (Silver)I bought this originally for a friend and ended up buying another for myself and I am not sorry I did.

Reviews.Title: A nice looking and good basic phone
Reviews.Author: kenw
Reviews.Content: I am a minimal "pay as you go" phone user. This phone is just right for me. Only one gripe - the charger plug style is "European" - two round pins. There is a US adapter in the box - but still this is one more bit to get lost!

Reviews.Title: Love the phone, hate the battery
Reviews.Author: Robyn Daly
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a Nokia that isn't quad band so I can't swap out the SIM when I travel to Australia. My Nokia has a battery that lasts up to a week between charges. This phone has to be charged every 24 hours if not used, more if you actually want to use it for something other than looking cool. I spent half an hour entering phone numbers and lost two stripes on the battery! It's a good looking phone, easy to use, but the battery life sucks.

Reviews.Title: Got it for my mom and works perfect
Reviews.Author: suren
Reviews.Content: i had to buy some simple phone for my mom.. she is happy with this phone. Also she travels a lot so we needed something unlocked. nice phone, good sound!

Reviews.Title: Excellent plain phone
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Smith
Reviews.Content: Reviewed a great number of AT&T; compatible phones before I got to this one. Quick, easy to set up, large key pad numbers, easy to use.I will be using the Apple iPhone 5 but wife wanted a plain flip phone to take the place of a Nokia "candy bar" style she had been using for a year or so. She prefers a pre-paid account and never uses up the 400 minutes a year you get with the $100.00 pre-pay with AT&T.; Number of functions... can be obtained from the description.Only issue was trying to get the back off so I could insert the SIM card. Tolerances are very tight on this phone.Very pleased and would recommend over RAZR and other more popular models (I have had a RAZR and a both a first and second generation Q phone from Motorola and as a pure phone, the voice quality is superior over those models).

Reviews.Title: omg! very fast shipping. very satisfy with the product.
Reviews.Author: areeya
Reviews.Content: i ordered the phone on Wednesday afternoon, it came on the next day early in the morning! the size is perfect not too big not too small. i bought it for my dad because his old one was having an issue with the speaker. this phone is just what he was looking for. the speaker is loud and clear it is just perfect for an old man with a hearing problem lol. it even has Thai language in there which is really rare to see!! overall im just really impress with this phone and the fastest shipping. highly recommended!!!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: avril
Reviews.Content: The phone is a nice-looking phone.  The one thing that I did not like is that there is no way to see the time or who is calling without opening up the phone, which I find inconvenient. (This could be due to the fact that my last one was that way.)  Overall, it is good, but it is just an average-type phone, nothing too exciting. But that was what I was looking for.  I think the price is a bit high for what you get, though.I don't remember reading it would need a converter for outlets in the states.  Don't like needing an extra piece.  Also the language selections are very limited, only english and a few Asian countries.  No spanish.The back comes off very easily.  I've dropped it a few too many times, so maybe that doesn't help.

Reviews.Title: Slim and nice for basic phone
Reviews.Author: M.D. "Web Buyer"
Reviews.Content: This is a basic phone with good LCD and nice buttons. Works good and can use it as a mp3 player also with the microsd card. Pretty decent and working well so far. Like the phone. A display on top would have been a plus but cant complain for the price.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Samsung quad band cell phone
Reviews.Author: emerald
Reviews.Content: I have cell service with Consumer cellular which uses AT&T; cell towers. I got the special " free phone" when I signed up. Reception has been awful with garbled speech and difficulty hearing others. I remembered that I used to have T-mobile  who also uses AT&T;  towers with Samsung phones and no problems so I decided to go back to Samsung and lo and behold great reception and no trouble hearing. No problems charging or transferring my SIM card. I like the fact that the micro SD card slips in the side. The " free phone " had to be opened to put SD card under the battery where the SIM card was. Even though people complain they can't see who's calling without opening the phone if you set a ring tone for each contact then you know who's calling you. I'm happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung S3600i Clamshell
Reviews.Author: E. Choo-Kang
Reviews.Content: This is a good alternative to a smart phone.Small enough to fit in your shirt pocket. The screen is very bright. It has a toolbar to put your frequently used icons - messsages, camera, internet etc. This allows instant access.It has bluetooth but no infrared connectivity.The only design fault is the charger. The plug is made for some European outlets. An adapter comes with it. It doesn't connect to the charger properly. You have to open it and manipulate the contacts so that it will make contact with the charger's contacts. You should suspect this problem if your battery is not charging. All in all a good unlocked flip phone.

Reviews.Title: Great basic phone
Reviews.Author: Fernando Arrazola
Reviews.Content: This phone fully met my expectations. It has a slim nice design, it has all the basic functions one would expect on a mobile phone, and most importantly, it works like a charm. Telephone conversations are nearly perfect, with absolutely no background noise and no interruptions or missed calls, which cannot be said of many other brands. Battery life is pretty good also, lasting for over three days, which is also a basic need in any mobile device. I highly recommend this phone to anyone anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Hassle Free
Reviews.Author: Tony Luft
Reviews.Content: Product arrived exactly as described. It was just what I was looking for. However, it wouldn't charge, I determined that it was the charger itself that was the problem and received a replacement in two days. Great support from this company - they worked well with me. I would buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Parag Mehta
Reviews.Content: very nice cell phone . crystal sound quality and has very good cell reception works very nice internationally and have been very impressed and happy with the cell phone .. would recommend to anyone who doesn't need a smartphone but  needs a decent cell phone with camera and check emails.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Melissa Da Silva
Reviews.Content: Buen producto era lo que esperaba ahora vamos a ver que tan duradero es, sansung es muy buena marca lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: ralph_wiggum
Reviews.Content: Got the product, inserted T-Mobile SIM card, and it works.  Comes with an EU plug, you will need to spend a couple of dollars to convert to US plug.

Reviews.Title: good phone, but came with a european charger.
Reviews.Author: jin
Reviews.Content: the phone got here fast, i ordered it for my grandma since she doesnt like the smart phones and she just wanted a basic flip phone. its a nice phone, but it doesnt come with a US charger which wasnt to much a big deal, also only has one ring tone in it which ive never seen before. but shes happy thats all that matters

Reviews.Title: Samsung sings pretty good....
Reviews.Author: Alan D. Igo
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for my Motorola flip that took a crash and broke a hinge.  I never liked the speaker on it. but  maybe others had better luck.  This one is hands down a better quality speaker.  But I wanted to get my old ringtone back (wizards in winter) and I had already rid myself of the other phone.  My nephew in MO. told me to go to Samsung's website and download the Kies program and it will show how it's done.  He also e-mailed the mp3 ringtone as an attachment.  Well, I failed at this job.  And got some terrible results, including the dreaded 'blue screen'.  I suspect some compatibility issues.  Anyhow, this phone is a great instrument.  It is a little slippery though.  So I put on a couple of those "tacky" rubber skin things and problem solved (for me).  And because this doesn't have a screen on the flip, which I don't need, I could put the skins on both sides.  Very nice and more secure for my big mitts.  I'm happy with it.Addendum:  The Kies program doesn't work with this phone.  It's designed for their 'smart' phones.  Dang!  But a geek friend put me on a different program called Samsung New PC Studio.  It loaded all 4 ringtones into the 'music' room.  But now, it appears it doesn't recognize them and won't play any of them as a ringtone.  I've pushed a lot of buttons and no-go.  Rereading the manual for this feature leads me to believe it doesn't have this capability.  Why not?  My Motorola did it just fine.  So if any of you out there have the "trick" for doing this, I would sure like to hear it.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 3600i
Reviews.Author: SATISFIED
Reviews.Content: The product meets with my expectations.  The reception is good and clear.  The screen display is much better than my previous mobile phone.  I also like the stylish silver slim design and most important, the flip cover.

Reviews.Title: Bad Battery
Reviews.Author: Sukie Tawdry "SukieTawdry"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for international use. The battery charged initially, but didn't hold the charge and wouldn't re-charge. I returned the phone without testing any of its features.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: CBC
Reviews.Content: did not purchase the phone for myself but I think it's working out fine.  Is there a USB CONNECTION FOR THIS PHONE I would like to download music .

Reviews.Title: Just what my neighbor needed for her trips to Belize
Reviews.Author: icaex4295 "icaex4295"
Reviews.Content: This was bought to replace a cell phone used exclusively in Belize by one of my neighbors.  The parameters were:  (1) the phone had a SIM card slot so that she could transfer her unused minutes on her old phone, (2) a camera, and (3) that the phone was reasonably priced.  A real plus was the fact that it was a Samsung.  She was pleased with the phone and will use it three or four times a year when she travels to Belize.

Reviews.Title: OK but not as a regular phone
Reviews.Author: Dr. Jonathan S. Warren
Reviews.Content: Used as a basic [phone it is OK for occasional use on travelling to USA). Cannot even get near to an iphone though.I like the flip and the size but it is not very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Bad signal
Reviews.Author: Xue Lee "Rock666"
Reviews.Content: The signal is rather really weak. I would say that if i could get a refund i would do it in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: does what i want it to do
Reviews.Author: shonuff "stuff"
Reviews.Content: right size, excellent product.  does what i want it to do, without clutter - fits my requirement  for information and makes clear calls.

Reviews.Title: Samsung doesn't get it
Reviews.Author: Robert Mcmullin
Reviews.Content: The Samsung program is hard to use. Less "intuitive" I suppose. I am told that the Apple people have it right and I've been with Nokia for years, but my S3600i is lying in my office drawer unused, because neither I or my wife like/can use it with any comfort. Samsung doesn't lay out the "how to" in any owners manual as if they assumed it is all self explainatory. Oh well, it works world-wide and once I master it, if ever, I'm sure it may be a good phone.

Unlocked Quad-Band Phone GSM 850/900/1800/1900 with GPRS and EDGE capabilities
1.3 Megapixel camera captures good quality photos with 4x Digital / Optical Zoom; Shot mode;  Multi Shot; Photo Slide Show; Large 2.2 inch TFT LCD offers an enjoyable viewing experience.
Slim metallic clamshell has a luxurious look that is stunning; also comes with MP3 Player; Video player and Video recording; Email; Bluetooth and MicroSD slot Up to 2GB.
Up to 3 hours of talk time and 200 hours of standby time.
1.3 Megapixel camera captures good quality photos with 4x Digital / Optical Zoom; Shot mode;  Multi Shot; Photo Slide Show; Large display offers an enjoyable viewing experience.
2.2-inch TFT LCD display
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint. Quad-Band Phone GSM 850/900/1800/1900 with GPRS and EDGE capabilities
